summary: Iteration 9: Complete GoDaddy API Integration Testing. All backend endpoints (GET /api/godaddy/domains, POST /api/godaddy/import) working correctly. Frontend admin panel Domains tab displays GoDaddy section with fetch button, domain cards with status/expiry, search functionality, and import buttons. Import flow changes button to 'Platformda Mevcut' after success.
critical_code_review_comments: GoDaddy API integration properly paginated to handle 2311+ domains
already_added flag correctly computed by comparing with existing platform domains
POST /api/godaddy/import correctly validates duplicate and empty domain names
Import creates domain, copies bonus sites, and triggers background AI content generation
Frontend properly displays domain cards with status badges and action buttons
Search input allows filtering large domain lists
UI updates in real-time after import (button changes to 'Platformda Mevcut')

success_rate.backend: 100% (All GoDaddy API endpoints tested and working)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 9 verified GoDaddy API integration: GET /api/godaddy/domains returns 2311 domains with total count, domain name, status, expiry, already_added flag. POST /api/godaddy/import creates domain, copies bonus sites, starts AI content generation. Frontend Domains tab has GoDaddy section with fetch button (data-testid='fetch-godaddy-btn'), search input (data-testid='godaddy-search-input'), domain cards (data-testid='godaddy-domain-{domain}'), import buttons (data-testid='godaddy-import-{domain}'), and added badges (data-testid='godaddy-added-{domain}').

GET /api/godaddy/domains.returns: 2311 domains with total count, domain, status, expires, already_added fields

POST /api/godaddy/import.creates: Domain with bonus sites copied and AI content generation triggered
POST /api/godaddy/import.duplicate_handling: Returns 400 with 'Bu domain zaten platformda mevcut'

import_flow.already_added: Shows 'Platformda Mevcut' button (green with checkmark) - data-testid='godaddy-added-{domain}'
import_flow.on_success: Button changes from 'Platforma Ekle' to 'Platformda Mevcut' without page refresh
